summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 56th Avenue South, from Frontenac Street to Willow Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same, in accordance with Majority Petition No. 114778 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
